adjectives.description: hypercorrect (comparative more hypercorrect, superlative most hypercorrect)

entries.meaning: (grammar) Nonstandard because of a mistaken idea of standard usage.

verbs.description: hypercorrect (third-person singular simple present hypercorrects, present participle hypercorrecting, simple past and past participle hypercorrected)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To change (a word or phrase) to a nonstandard form in the mistaken belief that it is standard usage.
